@graph.name: MetaGoFlow metagenomics data products EMOBON00224 for Sampling Event EMOBON_RFormosa_So_6
@graph.description:
This is a Research Object Crate containing results data from a MetaGOflow
workflow analysis of metagenomic data derived from European Marine Omics
Biodiversity Observation Network (EMO BON) project operated by the European
Marine Biological Research Centre (EMBRC).

Sampling station: Centre of Marine Sciences (CCMAR)
Sampling country: Portugal
Sampling station lat/long: 37.005639:-7.96925
Sampling environment: soft_sediment
Sampling station contact name: Bruno Louro
Sampling station contact ORCID id: 0000-0001-8164-581X
Sampling station ENA project number: PRJEB51661

EMO BON reference code: EMOBON00224
EMO BON source material id: EMOBON_RFormosa_So_6

MetaGOflow run id: HCFCYDSX5.UDI129
